oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pre-conferences, Congress, Exhibition and Assemblies! The Organic World Congress and the IFOAM General Assembly are THE gatherings of the global Organic Movement every three years. 2000 people from all continents debate issues, inspire each other, learn altogether and take strategic decisions. Save the date!
